title: Mildura fruit flyer
brief_description: A vital link between the fruit growers of Mildura and the markets in Melbourne. In less than 24 hours fruit is picked, sorted, packed and transported by road to the rail yeards, where it is loaded into rail trucks for its express trip to the city markets.
